title: Problem-Solving Strategy Workshop for Human-Centered Security Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming principles and understanding of information security concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using smartphone-based VR simulation tools, enhancing problem-solving activities that reflect real user scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three solutions to human-centered security issues and analyze their pros and cons
Learners can select compromising solutions considering user requirements and technological constraints
Learners can identify security threats and implement response strategies in VR simulation environments with 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
